column4: is there a meta package that i can purge to uninstall all of xorg and programs that depend on it? i have an old box with lucid that i need to press into service as a router, and i would rather not waste the overhead on X.
i looked at gdm and ubuntu-desktop, though both of those remove shockingly little.
I would litterally go into synaptic and start removing main packages like xorg, it should clean it down really well
